name: Chrissie A
text: We ordered 3 pizzas to be delivered for a team lunch at work and we were extremely disappointed. First, they were 20 minutes later than the time they promised us. Then, we ordered a taco pizza and it was missing the taco sauce, lettuce, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Elliott
text: I had the meatball sub and my Father had the calzone. He said its the best calzone he has ever ate. All delicious !

name: Gina Henderson
text: The food was great, and the two gentlemen who were working were very friendly and made me feel comfortable. I had the steak hoagie. The bread was toasted and crispy, the vegetable were flavorful and everything meshed together really well. This place also offers military discounts.

name: PT Bilon

name: darrell dunlap
text: My wife and I have been going here for quite some time. The staff is always friendly, helpful and committed to preparing our pizza exactly as ordered. Carlos welcomes our feedback and strives to make our pizza better and better. The store is always very clean and well managed. We are big fans and will continue to go to Fox's Pizza!

name: Emma Hamilton

text: The food is amazing! The owner and staff take really good care of their establishment and customers. My grandson loves the gorgeous picture in the bathroom. Lol

text: Love the pizza here! Especially the Big Daddy. Awesome value and quality for a great price. Can't wait to try the Big One pizza!

MY MAN CARLOS IS AMAZING I CAME BY ONCE & I HAD TO MAKE SURE I STOPPED BY AGAIN.

Staff wise they have good coordination. all the time I'm looking to order something it's busy. I think they are doing great and booming business.

text: Food was fresh and tasted amazing. Will definitely be coming back. Also they have beer on tap. What more could you want?

text: Great customer service and amazing food! Fox's Pizza is one of my favorite places in town. A must visit if you're a pizza liver.

text: Clean, and they have very good food. With a nice variety on the menu. You must try the stake and cheese wedge.

text: Great service, very clean place, my son loves it and asks to come here all the time. Very good food!

text: Good variety.  No soup!  Food was tasty.  Fresh naan bread to table.  Missing protein other than chicken.  Would like some vegetables.

text: It was an awesome place. The manager hospitality and the employees work was great. I ordered a salad and they cut them all and made it fresh in front of me. I will visit this place again for sure.

text: Great staff and awesome food! Great place to dine in or call for delivery! Totally recommend.

name: Haylie Quiros
text: Not a place for people who have an hour lunch. They only had 2 customers when i walked in and they were even fed after 10 minutes of me being here. When i got my pizza tasted like cardboard and had onions on it when all i wanted was a cheese pizza.....  Never coming back.

text: Pizza was good. However, made my order over the phone, went in to pick it up and stood at the counter for about 5 minutes and no one said anything. Both employees looked right at me and kept on with whatever they were doing. One looked like he was doing nothing, just walking around.
